snippet.title: Super Mario Moonlite World - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
This mod is a compilation of levels and other assets originally intended for 'Super Mario Moonlight World', thus making it a 'Lite' version, this includes:
- 15 Moonlit levels each more unique than the last
- Dozens of custom tilesets
- An almost entirely original soundtrack to fit the nighttime vibe
- Several custom backgrounds
- Plenty of remodels and retextures of in-game objects, including Odyssey-like moons to collect

Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SITv4LQLXKToCnUtcpVuUxSxYCglIIxR/view?usp=sharing

If you want to play the mod on console this version of the mod should avoid some issues in the main release: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1X9hFlYUQNBczhZVQU0FE1hO3XC5hcWiy/view?usp=sharing

Although this project has ended up being completed and released by me (Rimea), it was originally created by VK, a member of the community who decided to leave his internet existence behind around mid-2020 alongside this unfinished project.

Full Credits:
VK and Rimea - Level Design, Tilesets and Direction
Willymaker and Jannintendo - Models
Pokestir, Brickblock, Infinite, Finnet and Sandre - Music
Abood and KillzXGaming - Tools
DoctorTricky and Kysonati - Support
Nintendo - Everything Else
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/Rimea?sub_confirmation=1
► NSMBU Modding Discord: https://discord.gg/aZAaXVJ
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/The_Rimea
► "Business" Email: rimeamodding@gmail.com
